---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Report a maintenance or housekeeping task
title: "Maintenance: [Short description of the task]"
labels: maintenance
assignees:

---

### Maintenance Guidelines

**Describe the maintenance task**
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task to be performed.

**Why is this task needed?**
Explain the reason for this maintenance (e.g., code cleanup, dependency update, refactoring).

**Expected outcome**
A clear and concise description of what the expected outcome of the task is.

**Additional context**
Add any other context or details about the maintenance task here.
